mapper.select: select a.color_colorseq ,c.colorName from productDetail a join product b on a.product_Seq = b.productSeq join Color c on a.Color_colorseq = c.colorSeq where 1=1 AND b.productSeq = #{productSeq} group by c.colorName

select a.detailSeq ,c.sizeName ,a.num from productDetail a join product b on a.product_Seq = b.productSeq join Size c on a.Size_Size= c.Size where 1=1 AND b.productSeq = #{productSeq} order by detailSeq asc
SELECT a.productSeq ,a.productName ,a.productType ,a.productPrice ,a.productNew ,a.productBest ,a.productRegDate ,a.productUpDate from product a where 1=1 and a.productSeq = #{productSeq}
